issue.body:

Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/emc5f4j6yhw08c4sgkg04c40oksgk48po9zn4lnlnk.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/36szcp2n42gwss884w8wos8ck4cc8wwa5tzxbih4wo.png?nc=1)
